channel.title: First ever model release - Purple and Black DeathCape!
channel.description:
First off let me say that this is my first ever release of any model... ---------------Rep++ If You Would Like! :)---------------
Pictures Below!!!
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/PurpandBlkD-CapeBack.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/PurpandBlkD-CapeRside.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/PurpandBlkD-CapeLside.jpg[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------ --------------------Download link below!-------------------- http://uppit.com/9ip39xmgxcp5/Purple_and_Black_DeathCape.rar ------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS: 1% Me 99% to whoever made the DeathCape Model!
Comment and tell me what you think! :)

item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Your credits are wrong…It should be 99% maker and 1% you, and thats being nice. Honestly I don’t think recolors should allowed on this board, even more so ones that look like crap. There is more then enough tutorials in the help section to get you on the way to proper modeling.

@xXShockXx there is some for you too, on coloring models.

item.title: First ever model release - Purple and Black DeathCape!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:9, topic:442935”]Dylan,
I DONT know how to Change Colors etc… So yeah, I think this is a good model so yeah
If i got again 15+ Rep i would rep you

Gj[/quote]
Just because you can’t do something, doesn’t mean its worth gaining reputation. If I didn’t know how to tie my shoes, I wouldn’t assume someones a genius for showing me how. As such, just because you don’t know how to model, doesn’t make a simple color shift impressive on any level. Hope this clears up your confusion(?).

the elve age:

What brings you around here Dylan

I never left. I just don’t post much any more, seems when I did half of the people got offended by my critique anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: First ever model release - Purple and Black DeathCape!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Tutorial:

Since when is the Death Cape a Jagex owned model?

Death Cape is a recolored skillcape with a ‘custom’ symbol on the back, and wings which were ripped from another jagex model. Look at it, while it is hard to see with the black model matching the black background, its a skill cape with wings. Jagex didn’t release these models to the public for re-releasing, or at all for that matter, they’re ripped from caches. By that logic, they would not belong to the one who collaborated the two models into a cape with wings, and even less so to the person who downloaded that model, threw some new colors on and uploaded it. See what I’m saying?
tl;dr; Deathcape = Skillcape with new symbol+dragon wings from another jagex model. This one simply has new colors.

[quote=“ictbguud, post:6, topic:442935”]I was just saying he could rep if he wanted?
And if you don’t like it you don’t have to make me feel bad?
:l[/quote]

  1. You still haven’t edited out the rep++ beg.
  2. I’m not here to make you feel good for this. The easiest way to look immature is to ask for rep, you just don’t do it. If anything, instead of being sad that someone called you out on a re-release/recolor, you should try and model, post your own work up here, and I can give you a legitimate critique. Forgot to mention, props for atleast crediting the original ‘creator’ of the death cape. Most forget to even do that.

Also,[quote=“ictbguud, post:3, topic:442935”]Rep++ Please! :))[/quote] is a lot different from “rep me if you want to”.

Read full topic
item.source: First ever model release - Purple and Black DeathCape!

item.title: First ever model release - Purple and Black DeathCape!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

If you don’t remove the Rep++ begging, I will rep-- you. Seriously, its a number with no value whatsoever. Even more irritating is you post a recolor and expect to gain reputation. Goal accomplished, you are now reputedly known for posting recolored Jagex models and expecting rep. I would like you to make your own model, and post it without a beg for reputation. Then I wont have to come across as a douche. Also: tip for presenting models: Your background color should not match your model color.

Read full topic
